Kabel PLN Terbakar di Trotoar Cikini, Ini Penjelasan Bina Marga
03 Nov 2019, 09:39 by Imam Hamdi, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Dinas Bina Marga DKI Jakarta membenarkan ada kabel milik PLN yang terbakar di Trotoar Cikini, Jakarta Pusat, Ahad, 3 November 2019.
"Terjadi saat penurunan (kabel)," kata Hari saat dihubungi Tempo.
Hari mengatakan pemerintah memang telah meminta pemilik kabel di atas trotoar untuk segera menurunkan kabel dan memasukkannya ke dalam trotoar.
Ia memperkirakan saat penurunan kabel tersebut ada kesalahan teknis dari pelaksana jaringan utilitas yang menyebabkan kabel mengeluarkan percikan api.
Menurut Hari, semestinya kabel yang bertegangan tinggi itu terpisah dari kabel lainnya. "Jadi tidak dalam satu lubang. Itu mungkin terjadi gesekan," ujarnya. "Tadi sudah dieksekusi (diperbaiki) sama orang PLN-nya."
Peristiwa kabel terbakar itu diunggah dalam akun @jktinfo. Dalam unggahan itu, tampak ada api yang muncul dari bagian trotoar Cikini. Percikan api itu mirip dengan petasan.

PLN Cable Burning on Cikini Pavement, This Is Explanation of Highways
Nov 03 2019, 09:39 by Imam Hamdi, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - DKI Jakarta's Directorate General of Highways (Bina Marga) confirmed that a cable belonging to the National Electric Company was on fire in Sidewalk Cikini, Central Jakarta, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
"It happened when the (cable) drop," Hari said when contacted by Tempo.
Hari said the government had indeed asked the owner of the cable above the sidewalk to immediately lower the cable and put it in the sidewalk.
He estimated that when the cable was dropped there was a technical error from implementing the utility network which caused the cable to issue sparks.
According to Hari, high-voltage cables should be separated from other cables. "So it's not in one hole. That might be friction," he said. "It was already executed (repaired) by the PLN person."
The cable burning incident was uploaded in the @jktinfo account. In the upload, a fire appeared from the sidewalk of Cikini. Sparks are similar to firecrackers.
